content: lion brand pattern # 515 *ckc-tote pdf* skill level beginner level 1 lion® cotton article #760 3 balls crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm also called market tote bag #515 see hobo bag knit 1 for the knit version similar patterns in different sizes 4 ball market bag #l20065 2 29 in 73 5 cm circumference at widest point easy crocheted bag #30107 3 35 in 89 cm around at widest point *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/hobo-bag-knit 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/4-ball-market-bag 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/easy-crocheted-bag-30107
